summary: Jet-plane shooter game: adjust bullet spawn position near the player, scale obstacles by level in increments of 5, and update player visuals to look like a jet plane.

existing_features.title: Update bullet spawning so bullets originate from the player jet (or very close to the jet nose) rather than spawning far ahead of the player.
Scale the number of obstacles per level in increments of 5: Level 1 spawns/contains 5 obstacles, Level 2 has 10 obstacles, Level 3 has 15 obstacles, and so on (5 * level).
Update the player jet visual design so it clearly reads as a jet plane (sleek fuselage, wings, and pointed nose) and does not look like a “bud.”

new_feature_requests.summary: Spawn bullets from (or very near) the player position rather than elsewhere
Scale obstacle count by level: Level 1 = 5, Level 2 = 10, etc. (increase by 5 each level)
Redesign player structure/visuals so it looks like a jet plane (not a "bud")

projectName: Adjust bullet spawn position, scale obstacles per level, and improve player jet visuals
